title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 October 2015 - XWiki
content:

05:53 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki

08:34 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki

09:09 <msmeria> has quit  
09:16 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:23 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <vmassol> it's fun btw, some user has installed the ircbot app on their wiki but they've left the default config  
11:04 <vmassol> so on xwikitest channel I can see all that is happening on their wiki :)  
11:13 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:14 <ClemensR> hm, mayeb someone should tell then about that config thing ;)  
11:14 <vmassol> ClemensR: see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/IRC+Bot+Application#HConfiguration :)  
11:15 <ClemensR> you mean, people read docs, really ;)  
11:16 <vmassol> it's funnier when they don't  
11:16 <vmassol> get a chance to see what happens in their wiki  
11:16 <vmassol> :)  
11:17 <msmeria1> has quit  
11:38 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:46 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:32 <msmeria> has quit  
12:39 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:41 <vmassol> interesting http://www.javadoc.io/  
13:41 <vmassol> however the xwiki javadoc doesn't seem to work  
13:42 <vmassol> for ex: http://www.javadoc.io/doc/org.xwiki.rendering/xwiki-rendering/7.1.2  
13:45 <ClemensR> it only works for projects on maven central, it seems  
13:45 <tmortagne> it's on maven central  
13:47 <tmortagne> looks like a bug on their side since the first time I accessed http://www.javadoc.io/doc/org.xwiki.commons/xwiki-commons/7.2 the message was that it found a javadoc but it need about 10 minutes to process and now it just indicate there is no javadoc  
13:47 <vmassol> yep got the same  
13:47 <vmassol> but there are other javadocs that work for other projects  
13:50 <tmortagne> maybe the message is just missleading and it takes way more than 10 minutes  
13:50 <vmassol> I've been waiting for 30 minutes now at least :)  
13:51 <vmassol> but yes maybe there's a high load  
14:05 <ClemensR> if you search for xwiki-commons, there is only a pom.xml on maven central  http://search.maven.org/#search|ga|1|a%3A%22xwiki-commons%22 - because there is only a pom.xml to be released  
14:05 <ClemensR> if you look e.g. for  http://search.maven.org/#search|ga|1|a%3A%22xwiki-commons-tool-xar-plugin%22   there is also javadoc, as this module contains java code  
14:06 <ClemensR> and here is the doc, then: http://www.javadoc.io/doc/org.xwiki.commons/xwiki-commons-tool-xar-plugin/7.2  
14:19 <tmortagne> ClemensR: yes org.xwiki.commons:xwiki-commons is not the right one  
14:20 <tmortagne> same mistake for org.xwiki.rendering:xwiki-rendering  
14:29 <ClemensR> vmassol: are you going to work on  XWIKI-12647  ? (because you moved it from XE)  
14:30 <vmassol> ClemensR: nope  
14:30 <vmassol> it's all yours :)  
14:30 <ClemensR> ah, ok, I can reproduce, just trying to see how to test a fix. If I can get way w/o having to write a test for it, I could fix it (I think)  
14:32 <vmassol> ok cool  
14:53 <ClemensR> uh, oh, it seems "go to page" does not really work with nested spaces :(  so its a bit more work  
14:54 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
14:57 <OSIMasson> has quit  
15:00 <Ramona1> has quit  
15:00 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
15:01 <ClemensR> btw, for the blog post on the start page the link is broken: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome  (link to the "XWiki Days" anchor). I have no idea why :-(  
15:03 <tmortagne> it's broken in http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/ too  
15:03 <tmortagne> sounds like Blog app bug  
15:06 <tmortagne> sounds like it's just copy pasting blog post content in its own content making them interpreted in its own syntax  
15:08 <Enygma`> pffff  
15:08 <Enygma`> xwiki syntax 2.0 vs 2.1  
15:08 <Enygma`> new blog pages are in 2.1  
15:08 <Enygma`> while the blog app is in 2.0  
15:09 <Enygma`> really annoying  
15:09 <tmortagne> what is really annoying is the fact that the home page interpret them in its own syntax...  
15:09 <Enygma`> exactly  
15:09 <Enygma`> it`s so fragile  
15:10 <tmortagne> it's also very unsafe  
15:14 <tmortagne> hmm looks like it's fixed actually, at least I don't have the issue anymore in 7.2  
15:15 <tmortagne> yep definitely fixed  
15:17 <tmortagne> Enygma`: ok you fixed it  
15:18 <tmortagne> hmm but you fixed it in 7.0 and xwiki.org is in 7.1.1  
15:20 <OSIMasson> has quit  
15:20 <tmortagne> Blog.BlogCodeis exactly the same in xwiki.org and on 7.2  
15:20 <tmortagne> no idea why the issue is still in xwiki.org  
15:22 <tmortagne> it's actually not about the syntax it seems, I can reproduce the bug when exporting and importing the blog post on 7.2  
15:24 <tmortagne> ha no it's just that I don't have the wiki...  
15:25 <tmortagne> ok I do reproduce with a proper link this time  
15:25 <tmortagne> haha  
15:25 <tmortagne> Enygma`: I found the issue  
15:25 <tmortagne> no bug involved  
15:26 <tmortagne> you just made a mistake in the extract :)  
15:26 <tmortagne> you used 2.0 syntax in the extract and 2.1 syntax in the content  
15:26 <Enygma`> lol  
15:26 <Enygma`> I fixed the content, but not the summary  
15:26 <Enygma`> :/  
15:27 <Enygma`> all good now  
15:27 <Enygma`> thanks tmortagne and ClemensR  
15:27 <ClemensR> ah, ok, cool :)  
15:30 <msmeria> has quit  
15:38 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
15:42 <ClemensR> btw is the new feature called "nested pages" or "nested spaces" ? I thought "nested spaces", but its "nested pages" in bold here: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/XWiki+72+Released  
15:42 <ClemensR> (sorry, been away a bit and trying to catch up ...)  
15:43 <vmassol> ClemensR: yes we're changing the name  
15:43 <vmassol> so now it's:  
15:43 <vmassol> well  
15:43 <vmassol> there are 2 different features  
15:43 <vmassol> - Nested Pages  
15:43 <vmassol> - Nested Spaces  
15:43 <vmassol> (Nested Pages was previously called Nested Documents)  
15:43 <vmassol> they are explained here:  
15:44 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki72#HNestedPages  
15:44 <vmassol> (see terminology)  
15:44 <vmassol> and in the reference documentation at http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/ContentOrganization  
15:44 <ClemensR> ah, thanks for updating me :)  
15:44 <vmassol> which I need to update  
15:44 <vmassol> doing now  
15:46 <Pbas1> has quit  
15:47 <vmassol> should be good now  
15:47 <vmassol> let me know if the doc is ok  
15:47 <vmassol> or if something is missing  
15:48 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
15:48 <vmassol> adding some info  
15:54 <Ramona1> has quit  
16:20 <ClemensR> Is XWiki.widgets.JumpToPage.urlTemplate considered an API? I would like to scrap it, as it is not fit for nested pages, but I am not sure if it is "API" code  
16:21 <ClemensR> you can only access it via code like:   var foo = new XWiki.widgets.JumpToPage() ;  foo.urlTemplate.replace('\_\_space\_\_','somespace')   etc  
16:36 <ClemensR> well, I will just mark it as "deprecated" for now, just in case ....  
16:40 <vmassol> ClemensR: ok  
16:41 <ClemensR> it will really be unused after fixing XWIKI-12647 , but ... it does not eat much space  
16:46 <Denis> has quit  
16:56 <vmassol> has quit  
16:56 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:03 <vmassol> snif just lost my memory....  
17:03 <vmassol> (lost my chrome tab, crash of OS and then when chrome reopened no way to get the tabs back… there were 50 of them…)  
17:03 <vmassol> hmmm chrome saves them normally so there should be a way to get them back  
17:14 <ClemensR> uh, oh, traumatic memory loss, I see ... I hate when that happens to me, too  
17:15 <vmassol> yeah  
17:15 <vmassol> I have some problem with my mac, it crashes once or twice per day…  
17:16 <ClemensR> oh, it used to be very stable, but that was probably back in the 80ies ;)  
17:17 <ClemensR> here xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-7.2 refuses to start after unzipping a fresh download with java.lang.OutOfMemoryError ... I guess my box want to tell me it prefers to call it a week :p  
17:23 <vmassol> :)
